titleStmt.title: No Protestant-plot, or, The present pretended conspiracy of Protestants against the King and government discovered to be a conspiracy of the papists against the King and his Protestant-subjects.
titleStmt.author: Ferguson, Robert, d. 1714.
Shaftesbury, Anthony Ashley Cooper, Earl of, 1621-1683.

notesStmt.note: The first and second parts have been attributed to the Earl of Shaftesbury, but Ferguson affirmed he wrote all three. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
